name: CrossFilter

constructors.name: CrossFilter
constructors.signature: public CrossFilter(List<Reports.ReportFilter> criteria, Boolean includesObject, String primaryEntityField, String relatedEntity, String relatedEntityJoinField)
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the Reports.CrossFilter class using the specified parameters.

params.name: relatedEntityJoinField
params.description: Information about how to filter the relatedEntity. Relates the primary entity with a subset of the relatedEntity. Specifies whether objects returned have a relationship with the relatedEntity (true) or not (false).  The name of the object on which the cross filter is evaluated. The name of the object that the primaryEntityField is evaluated against—the right-hand side of the cross filter. The name of the field used to join the primaryEntityField and relatedEntity.

constructors.name: CrossFilter
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the Reports.CrossFilter class. You can then set values by using the class’s set methods.

methods.name: getCriteria
methods.description: Returns information about how to filter the relatedEntity. Describes the subset of the relatedEntity which the primary entity is evaluated against.

methods.name: getIncludesObject
methods.description: Returns true if primary object has a relationship with the relatedEntity, otherwise returns false.

methods.name: getPrimaryEntityField
methods.description: Returns the name of the object on which the cross filter is evaluated.

methods.name: getRelatedEntity
methods.description: Returns name of the object that the primaryEntityField is evaluated against—the right-hand side of the cross filter.

methods.name: getRelatedEntityJoinField
methods.description: Returns the name of the field used to join the primaryEntityField and relatedEntity.

methods.name: setCriteria
methods.description: Specifis how to filter the relatedEntity. Relates the primary entity with a subset of the relatedEntity.

methods.name: setIncludesObject
methods.description: Specifies whether objects returned have a relationship with the relatedEntity (true) or not (false).

methods.name: setPrimaryEntityField
methods.description: Specifies the name of the object on which the cross filter is evaluated.

methods.name: setRelatedEntity
methods.description: Specifies the name of the object that the primaryEntityField is evaluated against—the right-hand side of the cross filter.

methods.name: setRelatedEntityJoinField
methods.description: Specifies the name of the field used to join the primaryEntityField and relatedEntity.

description: Contains methods and constructors used to work with information about a cross filter.
